argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axpr | |- E. z A. w ( ( w = x \/ w = y ) -> w e. z ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_bm1.3ii | |- E. z A. w ( w e. z <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dfcleq | |- ( z = { x , y } <-> A. w ( w e. z <-> w e. { x , y } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_vex | |- w e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_elpr | |- ( w e. { x , y } <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_bibi2i | |- ( ( w e. z <-> w e. { x , y } ) <-> ( w e. z <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_albii | |- ( A. w ( w e. z <-> w e. { x , y } ) <-> A. w ( w e. z <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_bitri | |- ( z = { x , y } <-> A. w ( w e. z <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_exbii | |- ( E. z z = { x , y } <-> E. z A. w ( w e. z <-> ( w = x \/ w = y ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpbir | |- E. z z = { x , y } |
| 11 | 10 | #P_issetri | |- { x , y } e. _V |
\
 Derive the abbreviated version of the Axiom of Pairing from ~ ax-pr . See ~ zfpair for its derivation from the other axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2006.)
